entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugluktuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:24 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -40.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugluktuk Airport 08:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -40.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -55
Dewpoint: -44.7°C
Wind: SSW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Clear. Temperature steady near minus 40.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 40. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
